remarks: Rearrange the index set of a direct product family.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dprdf1o.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dprdf1o.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dprdf1o.3 $e |- ( ph -> F : J -1-1-onto-> I ) $.
dprdf1o $p |- ( ph -> ( G dom DProd ( S o. F ) /\ ( G DProd ( S o. F ) ) = ( G DProd S ) ) ) $.
